title: runtime: Release one copy of underlying data if the comparing result of two strings or two interfaces is true.
body:
### What version of Go are you using (`go version`)?

go version go1.7.1 linux/amd64

### What did you do?

https://play.golang.org/p/Lu9FZ9iqn6
https://play.golang.org/p/-wE2oUGce1

### What did you expect to see?

much memory should be released after the comparing.

### What did you see instead?

no memory released.
